page.title: 11Sports Centre Report
page.content: The Sports Centre was first opened in 1977, and the Manager, Mr. Phillips was there then,six months before opening.He was brought in early to find staff. Although deaths are non-existent, a lot of injuries have come from going to the Centre. Mr. Phillips works 37 hours a week, and he has 28 people to help him, 23 of which are part time. Sometimes Mr. Phillips does more than his share. The Centre has many sporting activities, but the most popular are badminton and swimming. The most recent addition to the clubs is Ju-Jitsu, which is like Judo/Karate. They might have a squash club, as squash courts have been built on to the Centre. Like most buildings, the Centre is worth more than it was. It cost 180,000 to build but if it was which it won't be,Mr.Phillips and companies
